name: Blindfold Chess
description:
This is a text-based blindfold chess game for Windows.

You enter your moves in standard algebraic notation, e.g. "e4", "Nf3", and the computer responds with its move. You can choose to see the board and list of available moves at any time if you're stuck. It has 10 difficulty settings.

You can also play in your browser here: Blindfold Chess Website
